posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 986 Sq.
Lakeside Villas is the perfect mix of comfort and convenience.
Located off Interstate 30 between Arlington and Dallas, we offer easy access to Highway 360, shopping and dining, Verizon Theatre, Lone Star Park, and Six Flags Over Texas.
We offer modern-style one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes that are sure to please even those with the most eclectic tastes.
All of our apartment homes are equipped with satin-touch countertops, spacious closets, garden-style bathtubs, ceiling fans and updated interiors.
Relax on oversized terraces overlooking sweeping vistas of swaying trees after a day of exploring Grand Prairie's dining, arts, and shopping.
We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $300 pet fee (non-refundable) per pet.
Pet deposit is $87.50 via Deposit IQ, per pet.
Monthly pet rent is $20 per month, per pet.
Give us a call for pet policy details.
